name: Deneb: Across the Stars
description:
Deneb: Across the Stars is a mouse only, top-down, hardcore-platformer.

Features

  • Simple game controls using the mouse
  • Auto-save system that records even mistakes
  • Various traps that cause anger
  • Beautiful soundtracks composed by 50mang
  • Cute dogs

Controls

  • Mouse - Move
  • Mouse Left Button(Hold) - Run
